TextBlock.Text: BEGONIA: How do we access the <color=orange>Towers Controller</color>?
PROTEA: Just before turning right into the <color=orange>Interior Entrance</color>, there is a loose panel straight ahead on the dimly lit wall.
PROTEA: There's probably a correct way to open it, but I usualy just throw somthing at it.
PROTEA: After taking the panel off the wall you can continue on to the <color=orange>Tower s</color>. It's dark though, so make sure to bring a flashlight!
